Some Lesser Known Facts About Pooja Sharma

Pooja Sharma aspired to become a journalist from a young age.

While pursuing her graduation, Pooja Sharma became an intern reporter at the Elegant Cable Networks Private Limited.

In March 2019, she began an internship with Sanskar TV as a journalist and worked there for 3 months.

In June and July 2019, she worked as a full-time Technical Communicator and video editor at the CPR Classes Anytime in New Delhi.

After graduating in October 2020, Pooja Sharma became a news anchor for the JK 24×7 News Channel in New Delhi. She worked there till July 2021.

In August 2021, she became a news anchor for the News India Channel in Noida.

In January 2022, she started working as a news anchor for News Nation and worked there for 5 months till May 2022.

In May 2022, she started working as a news anchor for INDIA TV (Independent News Service Pvt Ltd) in Noida.

Pooja Sharma is a dog lover and often posts pictures of herself with dogs on her Instagram account.

Pooja Sharma regularly practices Yoga and often posts pictures of herself doing Yoga on her Instagram account.

Pooja Sharma promotes Yoga for the live health-related shows on India TV YouTube Channel.
